title: Inspiring Open Source Advocate and DevOps Developer
description: Pradumna is absolutely amazing! They are such a talented Open Source Advocate and DevOps Developer and their tweets are always so helpful and informative. I've learned so much from them and they've really helped me and so many other people improve our skills and knowledge in open source and devops. They are also so positive and always willing to share their expertise with others. I can't recommend Pradumna enough to anyone looking to learn more about open source and devops! They are truly inspiring!
